title: My Man Wants To Make America Great Again
itunes:title: My Man Wants To Make America Great Again
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I am a 28 year old white woman and I am dating a man who is half black, half Latino. He is 32 years old, a great provider, has served in the military and he is amazing in the bedroom. We've been together 8 months and it was going great until one night when a news report came on about the Black Lives Matter movement.........

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
